posts.post_content: Iconic. Everyone loves this card, and for good reason. I still have her in my old school red/green aggro deck. Pump her up to 7/5 cast [giant growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=giant growth), then [berserk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=berserk), making her a 20/5 flying, trampling win condition. Still powerful. Thank you wizards for not slaughtering this sacred cow of magic.
posts.html:
Iconic. Everyone loves this card, and for good reason. I still have her in my old school red/green aggro deck. Pump her up to 7/5 cast giant growth, then berserk, making her a 20/5 flying, trampling win condition. Still powerful. Thank you wizards for not slaughtering this sacred cow of magic.
